contextId.occurrenceNote: This is an ironic comparison between the happy, noisy festivals of Israel and the loud shouts of victory of the Babylonians. Alternate translation: "They have raised a shout in the house of Yahweh, as the Israelites would during an appointed feast" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-irony]])
contextId.glQuote: They have raised a shout in the house of Yahweh, as on the day of an appointed feast
